name: A. Regular Bracket Sequence
statement:
A bracket sequence is called regular if it is possible to obtain correct
arithmetic expression by inserting characters and into this sequence.
For example, sequences , and are regular, while , and are not. Let’s
call a regular bracket sequence "RBS".You are given a sequence s of n
characters , , and/or . in this sequence.You have to replace every
character with either or (different characters can be replaced with
different brackets). .Determine if it is possible to obtain an RBS after
these replacements.
